SKU: - Category: Must match exactly a category defined in Settings > Categories (REQUIRED)
- Base Price: Price in INR without currency symbol (REQUIRED)
- SKU: Leave EMPTY for auto-generation OR provide your own
- HSN Code: GST HSN Code (default: 7117 for jewelry)
- Status: available | damaged | lost | reserved | discontinued (default: available)
1. First row must be the header row (do not modify headers)
3. Custom attributes from Settings will be matched by column name
4. Empty cells are allowed for optional fields
- damaged: Damaged goods (excluded from stock count)
